title: Zed hit double Q and proc thunderlord
body: He already won the laning phase cause I am standing at half health bar and he is resourceless.

replies.body: He will only hit a double Q if you let him get very close to you for free or if you're bad at dodging. Either way, it's your own fault.

It's also a very easy to dodge skillshot that takes up all of his energy (like seriously, he can't use it again for a solid 15 seconds if he w -> e -> q's). And leaves him vulnerable for the duration of the huge window. I never understand why people think zed is such a bully in lane
